name: Events Ads Banner
author: Fabio M.T.

sections.description:
Description

This plugin creates one or more* customizable Banner for advertising, events, communications, etc.;
You can add images & videos* to the title, subtitle, description and links to the event

The banner can be set open as default option in the home page, as well in the whole website,
or as closed in the other pages of the website.

You can pre-set publication time and removal for scheduled events*.

You can manage simultaneously different banners*, giving them an order, or a rotation by ID priority

This plugin supports multilinguage, is WPML compatible.

Banner Settings

It is possible to full-customize general settings (for all the banners) or individually for each banner*.

It is possible to customize: text formatting, paragraph, background colors, window position*, orientation (vertical / horizontal)* and banner size*, label form*.

Little Guide, Forum and much more

Click here for a little guide – “Events Ads Banner” o
per la versione italiana clicca su guida – “Events Ads Banner”.

Dalet Group/Gruppo Dalet here can view my works and for any question contact me on my personal forum:

“Events Ads Banner” Forum /
Forum “Events Ads Banner” – It.

Special Thanks

BeB Digital Architecture for providing graphics adjustments.

*

I’m working to do this.
sections.installation:
Automatic installation

  1. Log into your WordPress admin
  2. Click Plugins
  3. Click Add New
  4. Search for Banner Ads – BeB
  5. Click Install Now under “Banner Ads – BeB”
  6. Activate the plugin

See my little Guide: How to install an plugin from installer

Guarda la mia piccola Guida: Come installare un plugin dall’installer

Manual installation

  1. Download the plugin
  2. Extract the contents of the zip file
  3. Upload the contents of the zip file to the wp-content/plugins/ folder of your WordPress installation
  4. Then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.

See my little Guide: How to install an plugin manualy

Guarda la mia piccola Guida: come installare un plugin manualmente

Requirements

  • PHP 5.2.4+ (same as WordPress 3.5)
  • MySQL 5.0+ (same as WordPress 3.5)
  • WordPress: 3.5+
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Automatic installation

  1. Log into your WordPress admin
  2. Click Plugins
  3. Click Add New
  4. Search for Banner Ads – BeB
  5. Click Install Now under “Banner Ads – BeB”
  6. Activate the plugin

See my little Guide: How to install an plugin from installer

Guarda la mia piccola Guida: Come installare un plugin dall’installer

Manual installation

  1. Download the plugin
  2. Extract the contents of the zip file
  3. Upload the contents of the zip file to the wp-content/plugins/ folder of your WordPress installation
  4. Then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.

See my little Guide: How to install an plugin manualy

Guarda la mia piccola Guida: come installare un plugin manualmente

Requirements

  • PHP 5.2.4+ (same as WordPress 3.5)
  • MySQL 5.0+ (same as WordPress 3.5)
  • WordPress: 3.5+

Suggestions / Criticism

Suggestions and criticisms are welcome,
please write and write easily (my english is bad) !
ðŸ˜‰

Fabio M.T.

English “Events Ads Banner” Forum
– In italiano Forum di “Events Ads Banner”

Who is the developer ?

I am the father of two beautiful children, happily married. Technology Fan.

Who is BeB Digital Architectures ?

Is an Italian based creative lab, we develop software, web-app, websites, graphic and communication products.
Using new media, and mixing different disciplines, from design to engineering.

How to create your first Banner ?

  1. After installtion and activation of the plugin;
  2. Click on “Events / ADS Banner” -> “Add Banner”;
  3. The data required are “Banner’s Name” (or ID) and the “Title” to be inserted in the banner – everything else is optional;
  4. Clicking on “Save” you have created the banner.

See a little guide of “Events Ads Banner” o
per la versione italiana guarda questa piccola guida – “Events Ads Banner”
sections.changelog:
2.0.0

Code restyled.

1.4.8

Fixed another issue that it create a fatal error on front-end (is_plugin_active).

1.4.7

Fixed issue that it create a fatal error on front-end (is_plugin_active).

1.4.6

I’m sorry, I included wrong versions of files !

1.4.5

Correct bug that generate fatal error if is installed WPML but not “String-Translation”. Fix bug of translation with “WPML” .Page “Add”: now is scrollable a new
window that is opened to get image’s url; correct notice in date tag. General add overflow and word-break element for texts. Correct margin top into the banner.
Correcto color of link when are in admin’s pages.

1.4.1

Refactored CSS, HTML and JS files. Made responsive admin section. Fixed bug on opening banner between home and other site pages. Add a little function on setting’s page.
Correct bug to be, whole banner, a link.

1.2.1

Removed the display of an internal array in preview’s page

1.2.0

Partial solution for compatibility problem with “All in one event calendar”

1.1.3

Fixed a bug with mobile devices.

1.1.2

Adding editing functionality banner (php, css, js). Correct small mistakes. Changed icon images.

1.1.1

Oops I’m sorry, just a litle mistake (wrong version file declaration).

1.1.0

Add new feature; it’s possible insert images.

1.0.3

Bug fixed (css and js file was loaded out of plugin pages).

1.0.2

Adjusted output, position and animation of banner (also in adm panel); correct english and italian phrases; add css and js version declaration.

1.0.1

Fixed incorrect URL’s declaration in JS files. This could have blocked the display of images in the banner.

1.0.0

Initial release.

short_description: Banner designed for Advertising and Events(text,links,images and videos).Personalizzabile shape, position, color; supports multilingual and roles.

  • class-beb-events-ads-banner-adm.php: correct english text; add css and js version declaration; deleted commented script.
